@silentherow: Well, I've finished all the pages with the new font. I'm archiving right now, and I'll upload it to a ddl site as soon as I can.
@8TB thanks man, i will wait the one with the new font but i don’t object uploading the other one. Well, take care of yourself dude, and thanks for your work again.

So it seems that the second part will also be transferred to live action according to Kuroneko Smith's most recent blog post. Hopefully, it turns out to be good. As for my translation, I've still yet to receive any reply, so I'm going to upload it to either megaupload or zippyshare. I've completed 110 pages with the new font (the only part left is where Kyouko has sex with her husband,) and I still have the 121 pages with the old font. I've also got three re-purposed images that I'm going to add, where in two pages, I cut out images of her face from the first volume and "re-purpose" them for certain panels in part 2 I found unfavorable. I've also done a little redrawing as it concerns those three images, so let's see if you guys notice. I'm not feeling too well right now, so I'm going to finish the last eleven pages with the new font sometime later. If you guys want, I can release the one with the old font at anytime since it's ready to go. Let me know.

All 121 pages with the old font have been completed, and 80 pages with the new font, which I think looks better, have been completed. (It should only take a few days, maybe only a couple, to finish with the new font.) Here's another comparison: https://i.imgur.com/wd7IJd1.jpg (old font,) and https://i.imgur.com/7XDSGMc.jpg (new font.)

@silentherow: yeah, I haven't received any response from the site runner at all. I considered uploading it to hitomi.la but that site has no upload function at all either. I might consider uploading it to e-hentai galleries (but I haven't checked their upload function, either.) If anything, I'll try what you said and just make an .rar and upload it to MEGA, zippyshare, or other ddl site.
@8TB, nothing yet? I wanna help, but don't know how nhentai upload works too :/  can you upload in another place? or make a .rar and upload on mega or something?
Thx for translating ~ i rarely online on this site since i got gf , i always wanted this to be translated and its already done

@suwaya: I tried translating the samples he gave. Some kanji I can't make out, but in the first speech bubble she says, "hey, come here" the second speech bubble I'm not too sure about, but from what I've tried to translate, I'm guessing "you always have more sperm..." in the third speech bubble, second panel, she says "yes" [Hai]. Second sample, she says, "Ah..." "I'm cumming." And in the third sample page, she says "......tsu" which I'm assuming is part of something else she had said before, so it can't be translate alone. (Update): I still have not received any reply from the site runner on how to upload my version. If anyone knows how or can point me in the right direction, I'd greatly appreciate it.

(Before the change): https://i.imgur.com/5NCI1eA.jpg  and (After the change): https://i.imgur.com/InaWylE.jpg

Okay, since nhentai's site runner hasn't replied, I wanted to run something by you guys. As my luck would have it (sarcastic) I discovered a much better font yesterday. In my opinion, it looks much better and would make this part 2 look as I originally envisioned. Of course, this would mean that I'd have to re-do all the pages. Luckily (not sarcastic) I saved about 75% of my project files, so  most of the changes would amount to just my changing the font without having to retype anything. Also luckily, many pages are just phonetics, for which I have no intention of changing the font. So do you guys want me to release my translation as is, or would you prefer that I change the font. The samples are above:

Okay, the manga is finished. I corrected some issues I've had problems with. I emailed the site using the contact info given. I presume you have to contact the site runner first, but if anyone knows, how does one upload a manga onto this site?

@TidiesNebula: Hopefully my release will meet said expectations; believe me, while doing this, I kept in mind how snobby and high-strung we perverted bastards can be. So I put a little extra elbow grease into this one, lmao. Update: well, the text is on all the pages, and I'm going to take some time to proof read them. Expect the release sometime tonight, or by tomorrow at latest.
I expect your translation with high expectations @8TB, a passionate work is always welcome on this page for ugly perverted bastards like us
One more thing, I've only eight pages to clean and add text to. I didn't mean to imply that I would be starting that process for all the pages today.

...and at times, I would research individual words to find out how they're being used, (5) and some of the phonetics (sound effects) are translated. Not all of them are because it would involve redrawing huge portions of the image, but as long as it was feasible, I translated and added them to the pages. The whole thing is translated already, I just have to add them to the pages. So, I spend the rest of today and tomorrow doing that. Look out for it, guys.

Alright, my translation is nearly complete. I had to go back to few pages and fix some stuff. If it's not out by tomorrow night, it definitely will be out by Wednesday (barring any injury or compromises to my health, of course.) What's different between my release and cc0dykid's: (1) I used the larger pages from the original release, (2) my cleaning is better since I'm actually quite adept at using photoshop. You won't notice any gradients in the shape of rectangles (e.g. page 02 here,) (3) I cropped the images and adjusted the colors so that you wont see those pesky lines on the border, and the colors won't look as pale, (4) In my opinion, despite cc0dykid providing a fairly quick and accurate translation, I believe mine is more accurate. There are certain parts that cc0dykid either leaves out, or translates incorrectly (e.g. page 75, here.) I used not only google translate, but also a host of online dictionaries, grammar indices, SFX dictionaries, help from reddit translators...
Thanks, this is just the best. masterpiece/10
My translation is almost complete. Expect it in the next week (or two.)

After all the wait I'm just a little bit disappointed... Again it's a masterpiece just like chapter one but it's sad that there is a lot of scene that are approximatively the same (first 50 pages are always in the bed and it's always the same thing). The art is still beautiful and the scenes are very exciting but I would have like more variety... Then there is almost 20 pages with the husband, that's a waste, we don't care about him >.> But anyway it's still a great doujin and in a way I could never get enough of this one...
